about_the_game:
The streets of modern day Europe continue to be plagued with infected scum, all efforts to contain the outbreak have failed. They're killing everything in their path and swarming their wave of death upon every living being. This type of destruction will soon destroy humanity as we know it.

To hell with that!

It's go time soldier!

Key Features:


  • Base building system: An extensive base building system where you may place objects such as chain link fences, sandbags, barbed wire, concrete barriers, turrets, mines, fog lights and other military-grade components!
  • Variety of infected: New enemies and fan favourites are back from the original game only this time, they are smarter, greater in number and way more deadly
  • Weapons Shop: Browse through the wide variety of weapons available in the arsenal to kit yourself out with your favourite firearms!
  • Weapon Attachments: Customise your weapons however you like with attachments like precision scopes, extended magazines, compensators, tactical stocks, vertical grips and many more!
  • Boss Fights: Unique Boss fights to challenge even the most seasoned zombie slayers
  • Metal Music: Metal music mayhem - Rock out whilst laying waste to hordes of the undead!
  • 4 Player Co-op Or Solo Play: Cooperative gameplay for up to four players
  • High Scores: Compete with other players around the world to earn rank #1

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

detailed_description:
The streets of modern day Europe continue to be plagued with infected scum, all efforts to contain the outbreak have failed. They're killing everything in their path and swarming their wave of death upon every living being. This type of destruction will soon destroy humanity as we know it.

To hell with that!

It's go time soldier!

Key Features:


  • Base building system: An extensive base building system where you may place objects such as chain link fences, sandbags, barbed wire, concrete barriers, turrets, mines, fog lights and other military-grade components!
  • Variety of infected: New enemies and fan favourites are back from the original game only this time, they are smarter, greater in number and way more deadly
  • Weapons Shop: Browse through the wide variety of weapons available in the arsenal to kit yourself out with your favourite firearms!
  • Weapon Attachments: Customise your weapons however you like with attachments like precision scopes, extended magazines, compensators, tactical stocks, vertical grips and many more!
  • Boss Fights: Unique Boss fights to challenge even the most seasoned zombie slayers
  • Metal Music: Metal music mayhem - Rock out whilst laying waste to hordes of the undead!
  • 4 Player Co-op Or Solo Play: Cooperative gameplay for up to four players
  • High Scores: Compete with other players around the world to earn rank #1
legal_notice: Ultimate Zombie Defense 2 ©2024 by Terror Dog Studio Ltd. All rights reserved.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9 or Higher
  • Processor: 2 GHz Equivalent CPU
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3 Compatible GPU with 1GB Video RAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: Ultimate Zombie Defense 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7 64-bit / Windows® 8 64-bit / Windows® 8.1 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500 / AMD FX-8320 or better
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 560 / AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 22 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® compatible
  • Additional Notes: Laptop versions of graphics cards may work but are NOT officially supported.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700k or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 22 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® compatible
  • Additional Notes: Laptop versions of graphics cards may work but are NOT officially supported.

short_description: 4-player co-op, zombie slaying, base building, boss battling mayhem! Cleanse the infected wave by wave and upgrade your base with traps & defenses in Ultimate Zombie Defense 2!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Dutch*, Japanese*, Korean*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support
